src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : I 'd like to have something with my friend who is sick . Is there a cafeteria ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) [start] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hello Mr Robot . I 'm looking for the lifts please . [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LP : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] RC : Hello , I 'd like to go to the cardiology department . I was told it was on the second floor . Is there a lift to get there ? To go up ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : And can you tell me where it is please ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hello , can we have something to eat here ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] LP : Oh , how lucky , thank you . [MASK] [end] ARI : Thank you . # thank ( )

[MASK] ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] LP : Um , how do I know what time my appointment is ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LP : Um ... And ... And where is um ... Um , I , I remember , I think it 's room 17 . But I 'm not sure . Where is room 17 ? src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LP : Where can we eat ? [MASK] RC : ARI , the person that I 'm accompanying feels intimidated by by you , and and they 'd like to know where they can eat . [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] LP : Are there toilets ? And where are they ? [MASK] RC : I 'm asking on behalf of the person that I 'm accompanying , who is asking me , well , where are the toilets ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] LP : Are they accessible by disabled people ? [MASK] RC : My ... My friend does n't walk very well , can he get into the toilets with his ... [MASK] LP : Wheelchair . RC : his wheelchair ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] LP : I have an appointment in room 17 , where is it ? [MASK] RC : And he 's a bit lost , he has an appointment , he 's been asked to go to , to go to room 17 . Could you tell us where to go , please ? [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] LP : Is it wheelchair accessible ? [MASK] RC : Is the lift wheelchair accessible ? Can he use the lift ? [MASK] [end] ARI : Yes , you 're right . # affirm ( ) LP : I have an appointment at 10 AM , how long ... ah well yes ... # incomplete-da ( ) RC : He has an appointment at 10 o'clock . Do you know if there is a waiting time , if he has time for a coffee or do we have to go straight to the treatment room ? # request ( clinic ( busyness ) ) ARI : No , there are n't too many people . The doctor will take you on time . # disaffirm ( ) ; inform ( clinic ( busyness ) ) LP : I do n't know ... # incomplete-da ( ) ARI : Thank you , see you around , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : Um hello , okay , I think we need to find the rheumatology ward . # greet ( ) ; request ( location ( rheumatology_ward ) ) RP : Yes , I think that 's it . Ok , we 'll see if he can give us any information . # affirm ( ) ; request ( help ) [start] LC : Mhm . [MASK] RP : So do you want to ask him or do you want me to ? I 'll do it . src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LC : Do you want to go to the toilet ? [MASK] RP : Oh yes . And it 's urgent . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] RP : Oh , well , I 'd love to . [MASK] RP : What 's good on your menu ? [MASK] ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] RP : But what if I have an appointment in the morning ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : So we do n't eat , we are n't offered breakfast ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Well , thanks anyway . [MASK] ARI : Thank you very much .
